ec.char_limit_12: Limit of 12 characters / No spaces, No special characters
ec.char_up_to_50: Up to 50 characters can be registered

para.about_wallet: What is a wallet? How do I do it?
para.linking_google: At PFPlay, you can become a DJ by linking your Google account!
para.need_google_login: This feature requires Google account login
para.logout_confirm: Would you like to log out? When you log out, you will be redirected to
para.withdraw_confirm: Are you sure you want to withdraw? When you withdraw, mission points, playlists, etc. will be deleted and cannot be recovered.
para.withdraw_completed: Withdrawal is complete. See you next time!
para.auth_quota_exceeded: The quota for this authority has been exceeded
para.no_change_authority: You cannot arbitrarily change the authority of a higher-ranking user

para.guest_limit: Access to certain features is limited without logging in. Enjoy full services by linking your Google account

ec.integrated_body: Face selection is not available for integrated Body

para.what_wear: What should we wear to play?

para.freely_host: Host a party with the theme you want freely!

para.auto_close_30days: If there is no DJing for 30 days, the party room will automatically close
para.existing_party: It's already an existing party name.
para.stop_editing: The content written so far is not saved. Would you like to stop editing?
para.close_party: Are you sure you want to close the current party room? All data will not be saved.
para.no_longer_see_chat: You will no longer see the user's chat in this room (applies to me only)
para.leave_party_confirm: Changes will not be saved. Would you like to leave the party room?

title.time_limit: DJing time limit per session: n minutes

para.no_dj_member: There are currently no DJing members. Try to become a DJ to take charge of the party's excitement!
para.create_playlist_first: Please create a playlist first for queue registration
para.cancel_dj_queue_confirm: Do you want to cancel the DJ queue registration?
para.lock_dj_queue: Would you like to lock the queue? If you lock it, no new DJ will be added.
para.skip_dj_song: Would you like to skip the current DJing song?
para.deleted_queue_by_admin: You have been removed from the queue by the administrator
para.locked_queue_by_admin: The current DJ queue is locked by the administrator
para.skipped_song_by_admin: According to the admin policy, songs longer than n minutes will be automatically skipped
para.dj_in_order: Each DJ in the queue plays music in order
para.played_sequentially: Songs from the top of the playlist are played sequentially, one per person
para.empty_dj: zZz...There is no DJing in progress...

para.edit_only_admin: Only administrators above Community Manager can edit
para.noti_deleted: When registering a notice, the existing notice will be deleted!

para.delete_playlist_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete the selected item from the list?
para.delete_duplicated_list_confirm: $1' already has this song! Shall we delete the duplicate song and put it back?
para.no_list_yet: There's no list yet! Try to fill it with your favorite songs.
para.up_to_10_if_connect_wallet: If you connect your wallet, you can create up to 10!

ec.exceeded_list_connect_wallet: You have already exceeded the number of lists that can be created.
ec.exceeded_list: Oh no! You have exceeded the number of lists that can be created. You can only create up to 10.
ec.up_to_100_songs: You can only add up to 100 songs per playlist
